ESP (a private company), not by a tax authority or commercial registry - This supports ACC classification 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION**: Based on the analysis, this is clearly an ACC document because: - It's titled "CERTIFICACIÓN DE COMPOSICIÓN ACCIONARIA" (Shareholder Composition Certification) - It shows detailed shareholding information with percentages and number of shares - It contains terminology like "Accionista", "Acciones", "% Participación" - It's issued by the company itself, not by a government authority - The main purpose is to show the shareholding composition of the company This is not: - CECRL (personal identification document) - CERL (certificate from commercial registry authority) - RUT (tax registration document from DIAN) - RUB (final beneficiary registration) I'll proceed with extracting the text and preparing it for JSON formatting, ensuring all special characters are properly escaped.
